name: Adrift Pilgrim
description:
You have been cursed to have your soul slowly wither away, after many months at sea you arrive on the island where the fabled Relic is said to be. Can you make it the the holy site and free yourself of your impending DOOM?

P.S. Also if you know what genre this is, can you please post it in the comments, I don't know how to classify this.

P.P.S. I apologize for the very buggy code of this thing.
